description: 文本缩略组件，支持多行缩略、富文本、自定义缩略符、尾字符过滤等。

descriptionTags.en: Text ellipsis component supports multi-line abbreviations, rich text, custom abbreviations, tail character filtering, etc.
descriptionTags.name: 文本缩略

maxHeight.description:
最大显示高度，单位 px，优先级高于 maxLine
@en Maximum display height(unit: px), priority higher than maxLine
maxHeight.name: maxHeight

tags.en: Maximum display height(unit: px), priority higher than maxLine

maxHeight.descWithTags: 最大显示高度，单位 px，优先级高于 maxLine

endExcludes.description:
文本结尾处（缩略符之前）需要过滤掉的字符
@en Characters to filter out at the end of the text (before the ellipsis)
endExcludes.name: endExcludes

tags.en: Characters to filter out at the end of the text (before the ellipsis)

endExcludes.descWithTags: 文本结尾处（缩略符之前）需要过滤掉的字符

reflowOnResize.description:
容器大小变化时是否自适应，使用原生缩略时默认为 true
@en Whether to adapt when the container size changes, the default is true when using native ellipsis
reflowOnResize.name: reflowOnResize

tags.en: Whether to adapt when the container size changes, the default is true when using native ellipsis

reflowOnResize.descWithTags: 容器大小变化时是否自适应，使用原生缩略时默认为 true

floatEllipsisNode.description:
文本缩略时，缩略符节点是否浮在文本右下角（默认加渐变色背景）
@en Whether the abbreviation node is floating in the lower right corner of the text (with a gradient background by default)
floatEllipsisNode.name: floatEllipsisNode

tags.en: Whether the abbreviation node is floating in the lower right corner of the text (with a gradient background by default)

floatEllipsisNode.descWithTags: 文本缩略时，缩略符节点是否浮在文本右下角（默认加渐变色背景）

onReflow.description:
文本缩略处理的完成回调
@en Callback when text omission processing is complete
onReflow.name: onReflow

tags.en: Callback when text omission processing is complete

onReflow.descWithTags: 文本缩略处理的完成回调

text.description:
需要缩略的文本内容
@en Text content to be omitted
text.name: text

ellipsis.description:
是否开启缩略
@en Whether to enable ellipsis
ellipsis.name: ellipsis

maxLine.description:
最大显示行数
@en Maximum number of displayed lines
maxLine.name: maxLine

dangerouslyUseInnerHTML.description:
是否使用 innerHTML 插入文本（警告：务必确保 text 安全可靠，否则易导致 XSS 漏洞）
@en Whether to use innerHTML to insert text (warning: make sure the text is safe and reliable, otherwise it will easily lead to XSS vulnerabilities)
dangerouslyUseInnerHTML.name: dangerouslyUseInnerHTML

tags.en: Whether to use innerHTML to insert text (warning: make sure the text is safe and reliable, otherwise it will easily lead to XSS vulnerabilities)

dangerouslyUseInnerHTML.descWithTags: 是否使用 innerHTML 插入文本（警告：务必确保 text 安全可靠，否则易导致 XSS 漏洞）

ellipsisNode.description:
自定义缩略符节点，文本缩略时插入文本尾部
@en Customize the ellipsis node, insert at the end of the text when the text is omitted
ellipsisNode.name: ellipsisNode

tags.en: Customize the ellipsis node, insert at the end of the text when the text is omitted

ellipsisNode.descWithTags: 自定义缩略符节点，文本缩略时插入文本尾部

collapseNode.description:
自定义收起符节点，不为空且文本展开时插入文本尾部
@en Customize the collapse node, when the value is not empty and the text is expanded, the node is  inserted at the end of the text
collapseNode.name: collapseNode

tags.en: Customize the collapse node, when the value is not empty and the text is expanded, the node is  inserted at the end of the text

collapseNode.descWithTags: 自定义收起符节点，不为空且文本展开时插入文本尾部

onEllipsisNodeClick.description:
缩略节点点击事件
@en Ellipsis node click event
onEllipsisNodeClick.name: onEllipsisNodeClick

onCollapseNodeClick.description:
收起节点点击事件
@en Collapse node click event
onCollapseNodeClick.name: onCollapseNodeClick

dom.name: dom
dom.description:
最外层元素 DOM
@en The outermost element DOM

reflow.name: reflow
reflow.description:
控制容器重新编排
@en Control container to reflow
